name: Lignum Carcerem
description:
Lignum Carcerem   

This suspenseful visual novel takes place in a fantasy realm. You are a prisoner inside a giant, enchanted tree. Can you escape, or will you die trying?  

 

Credits:  

Programmers: Robert Foxgrover-Foley and Connor Yarnott

Artists: Zack Olson and Emily Shaffer

Story writers: Kendra Aumann-Weyenberg and Ira Hoffman  

Task Breakdown:

Connor Yarnott: Game interface and visual and audio effects

Robert Foxgrover-Foley: Choice mechanic and dialogue boxes

Emily Shaffer: Character art and design

Zack Olson: Room art and scenery design

Ira Hoffman: Story text and character development

Kendra Aumann-Weyenberg: Story text and music selection
